Reason: The configuration option 'XML_PARSER_VALIDATING' is performance-sensitive because it directly affects the behavior of the XML parser during parsing, which can lead to notable performance variations at the system level. Setting the option to true triggers validation during parsing, which can be time-expensive and memory-expensive operations. This validation behavior impacts the execution time of the 'transcode' method and can significantly affect system performance. Therefore, the 'XML_PARSER_VALIDATING' configuration is considered performance-sensitive.
